events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving their vehicle and another car at a traffic junction during heavy rain.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident after reviewing the provided initial report and incident description submitted by the insured.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage the investigation and communication with the claimant regarding the car collision claim.
An official acknowledgment of the claim has been sent to the customer including details about the next steps and documentation requirements.
Request sent for additional documents including police report, car damage photos, and insurance policy for further processing.
Customer submitted the required documents including the police report, photographs of damaged vehicle parts, and proof of insurance coverage.
An investigator was assigned to evaluate the accident circumstances, verify documents, and assess the damage to the vehicle.
Investigation concluded confirming liability of the other party and extent of damage eligible for reimbursement under the policy.
The insurer proposed a settlement amount based on expert estimates covering damages and rental car costs during repair period.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely handling of the claim.
The claim was formally approved following customer's consent to the settlement terms, authorizing payment disbursement.
Payment to cover car repair and associated costs was transferred to the claimantâ€™s bank account as per agreement.
The claim was officially closed after successful payment and no further disputes or enquiries were reported by the customer.
